sources.title: Beyond the Night | Full Movie | Mystery Thriller
sources.description:
Beyond the Night - When a Marine's son reveals damning information about a local gangster's missing daughter, a war of attrition wreaks havoc on their forgotten coal mining town.
2018.  Stars: Tammy Blanchard, Zane Holtz, Azhy Robertson
*Licensed from Breaking Glass Pictures. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: U.S. Marine Ray Marrow (Zane Holtz) returns home after active duty in Syria when his wife is killed in a car accident. Meanwhile, 5-year-old son Lawrence Marrow (Azhy Robertson), who survived the accident, gets post-traumatic stress disorder and it begins to manifest in strange ways. The boy begins to show a supernatural knowledge of the disappearance of a young woman, causing Ray to be the target of a local gangster.
metadata.Actors: Tammy Blanchard, Zane Holtz, Azhy Robertson
